Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Retail or Restaurant Space Available for Lease or Sale

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Fronting Columbia Pike in Arlington. Intersection of Columbia Pike, Four Mile Run and the W&OD Trail.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Up to 9,291 rentable square feet available for restaurant or retail users at new, 78 unit condominium project. 24' ceiling heights. 20 dedicated parking spaces.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Retail and Restaurant Spaces Available For Lease or Sale on Columbia Pike

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located on Fairfax Drive in Ballston, directly across the street from the Ballston-MU Metro Station (Orange/Blue/Silver Lines). Strong residential and professional area. Local co-tenants include Uncle Julio's, IHOP and Ballston Quarter.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Street level retail space available (former Zoe's Kitchen) in The Nature Conservancy building in the heart of Ballston. 2nd generation restaurant with full kitchen and venting available.

Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text: 4,662 SF former restaurant space with outdoor patio area. 13'7" ceilings. Glass front facing Fairfax Drive.
1,116 SF flex retail space with glass front. Optional lobby entrance.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: 14 Foot Ceiling in Former Restaurant Space
Outdoor Patio Seating Adjacent to 4,662 SF Space

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: 4301 N. Fairfax Drive is located right off of Glebe Road in Arlington.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 4 miles out of Washington, DC, Ballston Station is located in the R-B Corridor of Arlington. Accessible via Metro (Orange Line), bus and walking, 4301 N. Fairfax has a population of approximately 15,500 people within a 10 minute walk from the building.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Ground Floor Retail Space Available 4301 N. Fairfax Drive
